subject: New RS Radios that dont Click when hacked
author: psfponies
full_text:
I am thinking about trying another RS radio and I am wondering which 
ones dont have the annoying clicking when hacked. I believe someone 
said the 12-820 arm band radio didnt click. Also I will need the 
instuctions on how to hack this one if anyone has it.

I am going to go to a couple of the older Radio shacks in my area and 
see if they have any of the older 469 and 470's.

Thanks
Kay
